name: the Castle Game
description:
Build your own Castle and defend the Kingdom in this medieval fantasy 3D tower defense game. Create impenetrable fortresses and elaborate mazes, and defend them with hidden traps, brave knights, sharp-eyed archers, long-ranged catapults, clever engineers, and more! Featuring an intuitive control scheme designed specifically for the PlayStation®4 system.

Features:
Play 15 beautiful maps through Campaign, Survival, and Sandbox gameplay modes.
Help your defenders using god-like powers obtained through unearthing legendary relics found throughout the Kingdom.
Unique gameplay experiences like escort missions to protect the King’s miners, and building and defending research structures to unlock new technology.
Upgrade your defenses and powers in the Armory using gems acquired through victory.
Beautiful landscapes, sumptuous medieval music, and quirky voice overs provide a highly entertaining experience.

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output
